organizations.name: tsururi instagram -  click here tsururi facebook

text:
Feeling so happy to receive these lovely skincare, especially those 1,000,000 sales items from Mandom <3 Thank you super much! I'm really excited to try them right away~ Before I did, I did an unboxing video~ A close up on whats in the bag!  
So let's check out whats so awesome about them that makes them so in demand~ 

At a glance~ Review - Brush - I LOVE the brush!!! No matter how hard or fast I press on it, it stays soft and gentle on my face! MUST BUY!!!
Cleanser - I Love the baby skin feel after the facial cleanser, I like the really that they are 100% botanical! Thumbs up!  Pore Pack - I don't really have much black heads to begin with so perhaps its not so effective to see how awesome this works~, but I do notice pores are cleaner! Mask - I love the gentleness and yet effective of this item! Skin feels smoother too! I can see why so many people buys it!

title: Tsururi Skincare Series
